column2: Domaine de Ronchinne - Chateau et Ecuries
column4: Bedding should be upgraded. Not comfortable..

column2: Domaine de Ronchinne - Chateau et Ecuries
column3: Localization. Views and inside the nature.

column2: Domaine de Ronchinne - Chateau et Ecuries
column3: During the short overnight stay we couldn't explore a lot, but hotel is in a very nice location, old building with views and well established gardens. A lot of parking spaces available.
column4: We have booked a twin room, but on arrival we have received a twin room but the beds where put together and only one sheet was placed on both of them. We couldn't separate it completely to feel comfy. I have pointed out that there will be 2 male colleagues travelling, but probably they didn't take this into consideration. Very expensive breakfast. Room was tiny.

column2: Domaine de Ronchinne - Chateau et Ecuries
column3:
We came to spend a long weekend here with our friends with teenager kids. There are so many facilities here that we had a fantastic time here without moving out of the domain. 
Even on a rainy, cold day we could enjoy the heated pool and the sauna, and the kids could choose from the many board games offered by the domain. 
All Corona- related measures are in place, I felt secure during our stay.
column4: The location of our room was not ideal, next to the staff's room, who started the day early and were a bit noisy.

column2: Domaine de Ronchinne - Chateau et Ecuries
column3: Gorgeous property to get away from everything. Beautiful view from our room.  Large rooms with high ceilings. Small but adequate bathroom. Outlet by bed for charging cell phone. Plenty of light with overhead and bedside lamps. Buffet dinner was wonderful.  Choose your own wine from their cellar. Outdoor and indoor seating.  Lovely bar on the main floor, again with indoor and outdoor seating.  Lots of different lounges for hangin I got out.  Pool and foosball table.  Totally recommend.
column4: No A/C but huge windows and they provide a fan.

column2: Domaine de Ronchinne - Chateau et Ecuries
column3: Very nice room, with a balcony and lovely view.  Evening meal was fantastic!  You pay a set price and help yourself to the quality starters, mains and desserts.  Good choice of wines and very good breakfast.  Plenty of parking.

column2: Domaine de Ronchinne - Chateau et Ecuries
column4: Service from the reception, difficulties with double booking, calling to check out while I had one more night, double charged ..
